section.title: Time expressions
section.sectiontitle: We use on + day of the week.
section.text1: I usually do my homework on Sunday.
section.text1a: He always cleans the house on Friday.
section.text2: We sometimes meet friends on Saturday evening.
section.text2a: They never watch TV on Sunday morning.
section.sectiontitle2: We use every + day of the week/week/weekend/month/year/morning or afternoon.
section.text3a: She goes to the cinema every week.
section.text4a: We go to the mountains every month.

section.title: Time expressions
section.sectiontitle: We use in + the morning, the afternoon or the evening.
section.text1a: She uses the Internet in the afternoon.
section.sectiontitle2: We use at + time, the weekend or night.
section.text4: I go to the cinema at the weekend.
